# Change Request Template

Use this template to document and track change requests throughout their lifecycle.

---

## Change Request Information

**Change ID:** CR-YYYY-MM-DD-### _(auto-assigned or sequential)_  
**Title:** _Short, descriptive title of the change_

**Requester:** _Name and role of person requesting the change_  
**Date Submitted:** _YYYY-MM-DD_

---

## Change Description

**Description:**  
_Provide a clear and concise description of the proposed change._

**Reason/Justification:**  
_Explain why this change is needed. Include business value, customer impact, or urgency._

---

## Impact Analysis

**Scope Impact:**  
- [ ] No scope change
- [ ] Minor scope adjustment
- [ ] Significant scope change

**Timeline Impact:**  
- [ ] No timeline impact
- [ ] Delays milestone by: _____
- [ ] Requires schedule re-baseline

**Cost Impact:**  
- [ ] No cost impact
- [ ] Additional cost: $_____
- [ ] Cost savings: $_____

**Risk Impact:**  
- [ ] Reduces risk
- [ ] No change to risk
- [ ] Introduces new risk: _describe_

---

## Affected Components

**Systems/Modules Affected:**  
_List systems, components, or modules impacted by this change_

**Teams/Stakeholders Affected:**  
_Identify teams or stakeholders that need to be informed or consulted_

---

## Rollback Plan

**Proposed Rollback:**  
_Describe how to revert this change if issues arise after implementation_

**Rollback Owner:**  
_Name and role of person responsible for executing rollback if needed_

## Scheduling & Implementation

**Planned Implementation Date:** _YYYY-MM-DD_  
**Implementation Owner:** _Name and role_  
**Related Release:** _Release version or milestone_

**Implementation Ticket/Issue:**  
_Link to GitHub issue, Jira ticket, or tracking item_

## Status

- [ ] Submitted
- [ ] Under Review

- [ ] Closed

**Status Notes:**  
_Any additional context or notes about current status_
